div.p: We are grateful to the European Commission for supporting the Arctic Climate Change, Economy and Society research project ACCESS (contract NÂ°265863) part of the Ocean of Tomorrow 7th Framework Program of the European Union. Jinlun Zhang is supported by NASA (Grant NNX17AD27G) and NSF (PLR-1416920, PLR-1602985). We are thankful to the responsible reviewers and editors, the comments of whom significantly helped to improve this publication.
